pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Aloe Vera Gel 500g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Aloe Vera Gel provides relief from sunburn, minor burns and other minor skin irritations. Hydrates and replenishes the skin after sun exposure.

Thursday Plantation Aloe Vera Gel is the perfect after sun lotion for you and your family. A natural moisturiser and emollient extracted from the Aloe vera plant.

Suitable For: Vegan.

Product Claims: Product not tested on animals.

Size: 500g

Fragrance Free?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

Alcohol Free?: n/a

KEY FEATURES

• Helps to replenish and hydrate the skin after sun exposure.
• Relieve sunburn
• Calm minor burns and other minor skin irritations
• Aid the relief of insect bites and chafing rashes.
• Relieve symptoms of dry and mildly inflamed skin.
• non-greasy and easily absorbed.

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. For external use only.

CAUTION

For the treatment of minor burns: Immediately apply cold water or ice packs to the burn for at least 20 minutes prior to use. Medical advice should be sought for the treatment of more serious burns.
It is recommended you skin patch test prior to use, Discontinue use if sensitivity occurs. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Aloe Vera inner leaf juice equiv. to fresh 974mg/g.

Contains: Hydroxybenzoates, Diazolidinylurea, Potassium Sorbate and Sodium Benzoate.

Directions

Apply liberally onto the body as often as required.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes

Recycling Code: 2 PEHD or HDPE
